io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty.decoder.record

Class MailExchangerRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty.decoder.record.MailExchangerRecord

  • public class MailExchangerRecord
extends Object
    Represents an MX (mail exchanger) record, which contains a mail server responsible for accepting e-mail and a preference value for prioritizing mail servers if multiple servers exist.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MailExchangerRecord(int priority, String name)
      Constructs an MX (mail exchanger) record.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String name()
      Returns the mail exchanger (an e-mail address) in the format admin.example.com, which represents admin@example.com.
      int priority()
      Returns the priority of the mail exchanger, lower is more preferred.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MailExchangerRecord

        public MailExchangerRecord(int priority,
                           String name)
        Constructs an MX (mail exchanger) record.
        Parameters:
        priority - the priority of the mail exchanger, lower is more preferred
        name - the e-mail address in the format admin.example.com, which represents admin@example.com

        public int priority()
        Returns the priority of the mail exchanger, lower is more preferred.

      • name

        public String name()
        Returns the mail exchanger (an e-mail address) in the format admin.example.com, which represents admin@example.com.
